title: WTB: Knickerbocker & Civil War Baseball Ephemera
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: WTB: Knickerbocker & Civil War Baseball Ephemera
posts.post_content: I am fascinated with baseball from 1845-1865ish and would love to add a few pieces to my collection.  If you have anything, please let me know!

You can find some stuff from the 1860s, but anything pre-1860 is tough. 
Finding a baseball image pre-1860 is near impossible.  At one time I had a circa 1858 ambrotype of two baseball players with a bat and a ball.  I do have a daguerreotype circa 1855 of a boy holding a ball.
